entry.title: funtion-callback-promise
entry.content:
目录结构

.
├── files
│   ├── a.json
│   ├── b.json
│   └── c.json
├── funtion.js
├── callback.js
└── promise.js

function

const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

const filename = 'a.json'
const fileUrl = path.resolve(__dirname, 'files', filename)
fs.readFile(fileUrl, 'utf8', (err, data) => {
  if (err) {
    console.log(err);
    return
  }

  console.log(data.toString());
})

callback

const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

function getFileContent (filename, callback) {
  const fileUrl = path.resolve(__dirname, 'files', filename)
  fs.readFile(fileUrl, 'utf8', (err, data) => {
    callback(
      err,
      JSON.parse(data.toString())
    )
  })
}

const filename = 'a.json'
getFileContent(filename, (err, data) => {
  console.log(data.message);
  getFileContent(data.next, (err, data) => {
    console.log(data.message);
    getFileContent(data.next, (err, data) => {
      console.log(data.message);
    })
  })
})

promise

const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

function getFileContent (filename) {
  const promise = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    const fileUrl = path.resolve(__dirname, 'files', filename)
    fs.readFile(fileUrl, 'utf8', (err, data) => {
      if (err) {
        reject(err)
        return
      }
      resolve(
        JSON.parse(data.toString())
      )
    })
  })
  return promise
}

const filename = 'a.json'
getFileContent(filename).then((data) => {
  console.log(data);
  return getFileContent (data.next)
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data);
  return getFileContent(data.next)
}).then((data) => {
  console.log(data);
})

entry.title: node-blog-route
entry.content:
添加路由

// src/router/blog.js

const handleBlogRouter = (req, res) => {
  const method = req.method
  const path = req.path

  if (method === 'GET' && path === '/api/blog/list') {
    return {
      msg: 'GET Blog List'
    }
  }

  if (method === 'GET' && path === '/api/blog/detail') {
    return {
      msg: 'GET Blog Detail'
    }
  }

  if (method === 'POST' && path === '/api/blog/new') {
    return {
      msg: 'POST Blog New'
    }
  }

  if (method === 'POST' && path === '/api/blog/update') {
    return {
      msg: 'POST Blog update'
    }
  }

  if (method === 'POST' && path === '/api/blog/del') {
    return {
      msg: 'POST Blog delete'
    }
  }
}

module.exports = handleBlogRouter


// src/router/user.js

const handleUserRouter = (req, res) => {
  const method = req.method
  const path = req.path

  if (method === 'POST' && path === '/api/user/login') {
    return {
      msg: 'POST User login'
    }
  }

}

module.exports = handleUserRouter

修改入口文件

// app.js

const querystring = require('querystring');

const handleBlogRouter = require('./src/router/blog')
const handleUserRouter = require('./src/router/user')

const serverHandle = (req, res) => {
  res.setHeader('Content-Type','application/json')

  const url = req.url
  req.path = url.split('?')[0]
  req.query = querystring.parse(url.split('?')[1])

  const blogData = handleBlogRouter(req, res)
  if (blogData) {
    res.end(
      JSON.stringify(blogData)
    )
    return
  }

  const userData = handleUserRouter(req, res)
  if (userData) {
    res.end(
      JSON.stringify(userData)
    )
    return
  }

  // 404
  res.writeHead(404, { 'Content-Type': 'text/plain' })
  res.write('404 Not Found')
  res.end()
}

module.exports = serverHandle

entry.title: node-http
entry.content:
const http = require('http');
const querystring = require('querystring');

const server = http.createServer((req, res) => {
  const method = req.method
  const url = req.url
  const path = url.split('?')[0]
  const query = querystring.parse(url.split('?')[1])

  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json')

  const resData = {
    method,
    url,
    path,
    query,
  }

  if (method === 'GET') {
    res.end(
      JSON.stringify(resData)
    )
  }

  if (method === 'POST') {
    let postData = ''
    req.on('data', (chunk) => {
      postData += chunk.toString()
    })
    req.on('end', () => {
      resData.postData = postData
      res.end(
        JSON.stringify(resData)
      )
    })
  }
})

server.listen(8000)
console.log('OK');

entry.title: swift 的基础知识!
entry.content:
1. from objc to swift

const int count = 10; 
double price = 23.55;

NSString *firstMessage = @"Objc is awesome. ";
NSString *secondMessage = @"What do you think?";
NSString *message = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@%@", firstMessage, secondMessage];

NSLog(@"%@", message);


let count = 10
var price = 23.55

let firstMessage = "Swift is awesome. "
let secondMessage = "What do you think?"
var message = firstMessage + secondMessage

print(message)

2. 常量 和 变量

let constant = 10
var y = 10
var x = y + constant

3. 类型推论

// 按住 option 鍵 + 鼠标点击任一变量 = 得出该变量的类型

let constant:Int = 10
var y:Int = 10
var x:Int = y + constant

4. 字符串 String

var message:String = "Talk is cheap, show me the code"

// 字符串追加
var greeting = "Hello"
var name = "xiaoming"
var message = greeting + name

// 大写和小写转换
message.uppercased()
message.lowercased()

// 字符串的字符个数
message.count

// 类型转换
var totalPrice:Int = 100
var totalPriceMessage = "The price of the book is $" + String(totalPrice)

5.流程控制

var time = 6

if time == 6 {
    print("自己煮早餐")
} else {
    print("到外面买早餐")
}

// 或者

switch time {
case 6:
    print("自己煮早餐")
default:
    print("到外面买早餐")
}


var money = 9999

if money >= 100000 {
    print("出国游")
} else if money >= 10000 && money < 100000 {
    print("国内游")
} else if money >= 1000 && money < 10000 {
    print("省内游")
} else {
    print("市内游")
}

// 或者

switch money {
case 100000...:
    print("出国游")
case 10000...99999:
    print("国内游")
case 1000...9999:
    print("省内游")
default:
    print("市内游")
}

6. 数组 Array

var book1 = "水浒传"
var book2 = "三国演义"
var book3 = "西游记"

var bookArray = [book1, book2, book3]

// 获取第一本书
print(bookArray[0])

// 添加一本书
bookArray.append("红楼梦")

// 一共有多少本书
bookArray.count


// 遍历所有书籍
for index in 0...3{
    print(bookArray[index])
}

for index in 0...bookArray.count-1{
    print(bookArray[index])
}

for book in bookArray {
    print(book)
}

7. 字典 Dictionary

var animalDict = [
    "cat": "🐱",
    "dog": "🐶",
    "pig": "🐷",
    "cow": "🐮"
]

// 这里有出现一个警告⚠️ Expression implicitly coerced from 'String?' to 'Any'
print(animalDict["dog"])

for (key, value) in animalDict {
    print("Title: \(key)")
    print("Emoji: \(value)")
    print("---")
}

8. 可选类型 Optionals

// 声明一个为 nil 的 可选类型 字符串
var hobby: String?

hobby = "running"

// ❌ Value of optional type 'String?' must be unwrapped to a value of type 'String'
// var message = "Your hobby is " + hobby

// 所以取值的时，应该解开可选类型

// 1. 暴力解开，使用感叹号 ！
if hobby != nil {
    var message = "Your hobby is " + hobby!
    print(message)

}

// 2. 可选绑定，就是将一个 有值的可选类型 赋给一个 临时的变量
if let hobbyValue = hobby {
    var message = "Your hobby is " + hobbyValue
    print(message)
}

/*
 总结：
    使用了可选类型，就相当于是快递的“货件打包”
    可选类型产生了保护的作用
    收到快递之后，只有拆开快递，才能取出货件，这就是取值
 */
